title: Realista (0)
body: Dr. √Ålvaro Rodrigues de Azevedo, in one of his notes to 'Saudades da Terra,' refers to the newspaper O Realista, whose existence is very doubtful and which may have been published before 1834. A newspaper with the same title was published, of which only 3 issues were released, from May 1 to 16, 1915.
